sentences.english: Unlike those of the West, Chinese loans are "no strings attached."
sentences.chinese: 不象西方国家，中国的贷款是“无附带条件”。

sentences.english: I think the EDG probably uses a low astigmatism eyepiece design like the SE.
sentences.chinese: 我想EDG可能使用了象SE一样的低像散目镜设计。

sentences.english: The stars are not afraid to appear like fireflies。
sentences.chinese: 群星不怕显得象萤火那样。

sentences.english: Its shadows are an ambush, its lights a surprise .
sentences.chinese: 它的阴影象伏兵千万，它的光泽令人惊异。

sentences.english: A slight, metallic sound, as of coins rattling in a pocket.
sentences.chinese: 叮铛声一种象口袋中硬币碰撞发出轻微。

sentences.english: He had ranked himself in the numerous phalanx of unbelievers.
sentences.chinese: 他一直象其它无数怀疑者一样持怀疑态度。

sentences.english: It tur out that you are Mr. Ford's son. No wonder you are the very image of him.
sentences.chinese: 原来你是福特先生的公子，怪不得长得那么象他。

sentences.english: When he said that, he was as fierce as a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 当他说话的时候，象一只老虎那样凶狠。

sentences.english: I guess he's sort of a miser like most bachelors .
sentences.chinese: 我想他一定是个吝啬鬼，象大部分单身汉一样。

sentences.english: In Japan, the brand, Zojirushi, which represents comfort has been impressed on everyone.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，这个代表着舒适的象印商标已深入人心。

sentences.english: The Sun Yat-Sen Mausoleum is like a huge green leaf that warms and comforts the heart of every people in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 中山陵象一片巨大的绿叶，温润着每个南京人的心灵。

sentences.english: To jump over in or as if in leapfrog.
sentences.chinese: 就象跳背游戏中互相跳过。

sentences.english: In this weather, he will come in a carriage.
sentences.chinese: 象这种天气，他一定会乘马车来。

sentences.english: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
sentences.chinese: 如果是您的时间，爱将跟踪您击倒象寻呼台”。

sentences.english: Chicago had a free-and-easy atmosphere much like that of Storyville.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥有一种很象斯托里维尔那样自由和放纵的气氛。

sentences.english: As he, Sven, warm heart, and her most loving words do not.
sentences.chinese: 就象他，斯文，暖心，还有她最爱的不言的默契。

definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
to be just like/can be compared to
to look exactly like/to be the spitting image of
